Uses of Package
main.java.pds

  • Packages that use main.java.pds 
    Package Description
    main.java.pds  
    main.java.pds.ui  
  • Classes in main.java.pds used by main.java.pds 
    Class and Description
    Chef
    The Chef is responsible for performing order item preparations and then passing the order items onto the next stage.
    Customer
    Customer.java This class is to manage the customer information
    Delivery
    Delivery is the class representing a single delivery person in the PDS
    Food
    Container for the food.
    Location
    Location.java This Enum type contains the list of locations available for delivery.
    Menu
    This class represents a menu for the PDS.
    Order
    The class Order is responsible for maintaining information pertinent to an order, such as the list of food items that make up the order, the customer who placed the order, etc.
    OrderItem
    The class OrderItem is wrapper around a Food, and will be owned by an Order instance.
    OrderStage
    The enum OrderStage represents each stage of the PDS that an order must go through.
    Oven 
    PhoneOperator
    PhoneOperator.java This class handles the phone operator operations: verify and create the customer information, create a new order for the specific customer.
    Pizza.Size
    Pizze size constants
    Stage
    Abstract class representing a Stage of the order process.
    TimeRange
    The class TimeRange represents a definite duration of time.
    Topping
    This class stores Topping information.
    Topping.Coverage
    Constants representing which portion of a pizza a topping will cover.
    Updateable
    Interface Updateable specifies the interface for an object that can be should be updated once per frame/iteration of the main loop.
    WaitingQueue
    The WaitingQueue class is responsible for storing OrderItems before they are ready to go out for either delivery, cooking, or preparation.
  • Classes in main.java.pds used by main.java.pds.ui 
    Class and Description
    Customer
    Customer.java This class is to manage the customer information
    Location
    Location.java This Enum type contains the list of locations available for delivery.
    Menu
    This class represents a menu for the PDS.
    Order
    The class Order is responsible for maintaining information pertinent to an order, such as the list of food items that make up the order, the customer who placed the order, etc.
    PhoneOperator
    PhoneOperator.java This class handles the phone operator operations: verify and create the customer information, create a new order for the specific customer.
    Stage
    Abstract class representing a Stage of the order process.
    Topping
    This class stores Topping information.
